page.title: 16BOWNESS-ON-SOLWAY.LIFESTYLES
page.content: {FASHION.}Ladies wear skirts, knee- length or below.Many wear trousers at home & for casual wear. Teenage girls -some wear mini-skirts, most wear very tight stretch trousers/jeans, T-shirts & flat shoes.Men & Youths wear work clothes to suit job, and shirts, jumpers, and slacks/jeans for leisure. {CLUBS.}Bowness Youth clubs, (Junior 8- 11) (Senior 11-16). Playgroup twice weekly. Badminton twice weekly (Sept- May). Women's Institute-monthly. Over 60s Lunch club -Tues. Sunday Club for children. ALL THESE AT LINDOW HALL. Mothers' Union - Monthly at Rectory. King's Arms-Darts,Pool,Dominoes.School Parent-Teacher Assoc. Outdoor hobbies include Hound Trailing, Wildfowling, Fishing, Walking, Foxhunting,Gardening & Ornithology.Bowling & Tennis at Port Carlisle & Anthorn.Swimming - Carlisle /Wigton.Young Farmers - Kirkbride.
